Title: Code review + commit Phase 9
Description: Full code review of 9.1-9.7. Merge to staging. Tag: PHASE_9_COMPLETE.

Title: Unit tests: Contest.from() mapping
Description: Write comprehensive tests for Contest.from(ContestDetailResponseContract): happy path null handling invalid UUIDs invalid dates status enum mapping Equatable/Hashable snapshot tests.

Title: Unit tests: ContestActionState mapping
Description: Test ContestActionState.from() with all contract field combinations. Ensure no Contract types leak into Domain.

Title: Integration test: Contest fetch flow
Description: End-to-end test: Mock API returns contract → maps to Domain → published to ViewModel → renders in UI. Full stack.

Title: Unit tests: Payout calculations
Description: Test payout logic: winner-takes-all tiered payouts decimal rounding no negative amounts idempotency. Edge cases with 1-3-10+ participants.

Title: Unit tests: Multi-contest isolation
Description: Parametrized tests with 5 contests. Verify Contest A scoring ≠ Contest B. Participant join isolation. Payout separation.

Title: Fuzz tests: JSON deserialization
Description: Malformed JSON null values missing fields edge case dates. Ensure no crashes. Graceful fallbacks.

Title: Integration test: Concurrent joins
Description: Simulate 15 concurrent joins to contest with maxEntries=10. Verify 10 succeed 5 rejected. No duplicate participants.

Title: Snapshot tests: JSON serialization
Description: Encode Contest to JSON snapshot. Detect unintended field changes across versions.

Title: Documentation: Domain mapping
Description: Write ARCHITECTURE.md addendum: Domain type specs required/optional fields null handling invariants. Team reference.

Title: CI/CD setup: GitHub Actions
Description: Create .github/workflows/build-and-test.yml. Lint gates: no DTO in @Published no optional Domain fields Codable/Hashable checks. Test gates: 90+ pass.

Title: Code review + commit Phase 10
Description: Full code review of 10.1-10.10. Merge to staging. Tag: PHASE_10_COMPLETE. Expected outcome: 150+ tests passing.

Title: SELECT FOR UPDATE locking
Description: Implement database-level lock for contest joins. Prevent concurrent duplicate participants. Test with concurrent join attempts.

Title: Batch contest scoring
Description: Service to score 100+ contests in parallel. Handle various contest types. < 2s per contest latency target.

Title: Idempotent settlement
Description: Implement settlement deduplication. Same payout settlement call produces same result. Prevent double-payouts. Idempotency key strategy.

Title: Audit logging: scoring replay
Description: Add logging for all scoring operations. Enable determinism verification. Replay same contest = same results.

Title: Soft-delete contests
Description: Implement soft-delete (status=cancelled) rather than hard delete. Preserve participant records and payout history.

Title: Pagination: contest list
Description: Add offset/limit to contest list fetch. Optimize with indexed queries. Support 1000+ contests.

Title: Unit tests: Payout idempotency
Description: Verify settle(X) = settle(settle(X)). Run settlement twice on same data. Assert identical payouts.

Title: Stress tests: 1000 participants
Description: Load test with 100 concurrent contests 1000 total participants. Measure latency throughput data integrity. Zero loss.

Title: Documentation: Operations runbook
Description: Write RunBook.md for ops team: settling contests resolving disputes replaying scoring. Troubleshooting guide.

Title: Code review + commit Phase 11
Description: Full code review of 11.1-11.9. Merge to staging. Tag: PHASE_11_COMPLETE. Production readiness review.
